alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 12:48PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Custer and southwestern Pennington Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Elk Peak, or 3 miles south of Hill City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Northern Custer State Park around 1255 PM MDT. Horse Thief Lake, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Black Hills Playhouse and Center Lake around 100 PM MDT. Keystone, Keystone Wye and Sheridan Lake around 105 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hayward, Rockerville, Bear Country, southwestern Rapid City and Reptile Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
